root.name: Bakushou!! Jinsei Gekijou
root.description: OverviewBakushou!! Jinsei Gekijou ("Hearty Laugh! Theater Life") is a long-running series by Taito that allows players to live an entire lifetime, moving through various stages of life and accruing as much wealth as possible. It is based on the Jinsei Game, or The Game of Life as it is known in the west. Up to four human players take turns moving around a board by a number of squares as indicated by dice rolls and make various life decisions, or are passively shown events happening to them, which determine their success.The game was followed by two sequels for the Famicom and four for the Super Famicom.
